title.narrative: Disaster and Climate Risk Management Project

description.narrative: The Project development objective (PDO) is to strengthen the State Hydrometeorological Service's ability to forecast severe weather and improve Moldova's capacity to prepare for and respond to natural disasters.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II A. 1 | Description :The Recipient will monitor and evaluate the progress of the projectand prepare semi-annual Project Reports to be transmitted to IDA not later than one month after the end of the period covered b |Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II A. 2 | Description :The Recipient shall prepare a report on the execution of the projectnot later than March 31, 2015 or any later date as agreed withI DA | Due Date :31-Mar-2015
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II B. 1 | Description :The Borrower will maintain a financial management system acceptableto IDA | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II B. 1 | Description :Treasury will open foreign currency project designated account in anacceptable commercial bank | Due Date :31-Mar-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II B. 2 | Description :The Borrower will prepare quarterly project management-orientedInterim Financial Reports (IFRs) incorporating financial information , procurement monitoring, and physical progress information |Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II B. 3 | Description :Project financial statements, withdrawal applications, and designatedaccount will be audited by independent auditors acceptable toI DA and on terms of reference acceptable to IDA. | Frequency :Yearly

title.narrative: The ECC is established, tested and operational

baseline.value: An additional floor is built to accommodate the ECC

target.value: ECC has been tested and is operational

title.narrative: Expanded lead time of weather warnings to users, particularly DES.

baseline.value: Lead time for severe weather warnings only 10 minutes to 1 hour.

target.value: Lead time for severe weather warnings expanded to 3-6 hours.

actual.value: Partially completed with the installation and operationalization of the Doppler Radar.

title.narrative: Strengthened capacity to coordinate response to emergencies.

baseline.value: No Emergency Command Center to coordinate response among relevant agencies.

target.value: Emergency response drill shows capacity improvements as compared to the baseline.

title.narrative: At least 50 investment grants provided and put on the demonstration plots (farmers receive information about practical techniques for adaptation to climate risks on pilot basis)

baseline.value: No activities exist to disseminate practical experience on adaptation to climate risks other than drought

target.value: 50 demonstration plots are established; 60 demonstration and dissemination events are organized

actual.value: 53 investment grants provided. 92 demonstration and dissemination events were organized.

title.narrative: Installation of Doppler radar which improves weather monitoring and forecasting.

baseline.value: No effective radar is currently installed.

target.value: As the radar is installed, improved forecasts are produced with warnings when appropriate.

title.narrative: ECC users are trained to operate the emergency management system.

baseline.value: No staff currently trained in the emergency management information system.

target.value: Relevant personnel (at least 90) trained in the emergency management system established in ECC.

title.narrative: More specific forecasting of weather conditions.

baseline.value: Scale of weather forecasts at 5000 sq km.

target.value: Scale of weather forecasts reduced to 300 sq km.

title.narrative: Now-casting tools, data collection and dissemination improved.

baseline.value: The process of automated data collection or dissemination is not available for an early warning system.

target.value: Operational now-casting is realized: automated data are collected, disseminated and integrated with the radar system and properlyvisualized, resulting in timely warnings for users.

actual.value: Contract for delivery and installation under implementation.

title.narrative: Project supported organization(s) publish reports on the effect of collaboration with stakeholders
